sentences.english: Demining or mine clearance is the process of removing either land mines, or naval mines, from an area.
sentences.chinese: 排雷或掃雷是從一個區域清除地雷或水雷的過程。

sentences.english: The corridor leading to the mine and torpedo part and to the fuel storage.
sentences.chinese: 這條通道通向水雷和魚雷零件庫以及燃料儲存庫。

sentences.english: A mine blew the enemy warship to bits.
Area as well as rivers and streams lake mine attack barrier warship.
sentences.chinese: 區以及江河湖泊佈設水雷障礙的軍艦。

sentences.english: Stray mines began to turn up off the Pacific coast, imperilling commercial shipping.
sentences.chinese: 散逸的水雷開始在太平洋海岸出現而危及商船的航行。
他們的船被水雷炸燬了。

sentences.english: The first was the blockading of the English Channel with mine barrages.
sentences.chinese: 首先利用佈設水雷封鎖英吉利海峽。

sentences.english: The long-range electric torpedo homes in on the noise of the target ship 's propellers.
sentences.chinese: 遠程電動水雷順着目標船的螺旋漿的聲音進行追蹤。

sentences.english: This paper introduces technologies of rocket-like trajectory indication signal device of an exercising self-propelled mine.
sentences.chinese: 本文主要介紹自航水雷操雷彈道指示火箭信號彈技術。

sentences.english: Mine network consists of the netty mines and the wireless buoy nodes.
sentences.chinese: 聯網水雷陣由聯網水雷和無線浮標節點組成。

sentences.english: Once there, it has very little defenses against submarines and torpedoes.
sentences.chinese: 建好後，它對於潛艇和水雷也沒有足夠的防衛。

sentences.english: So it is possible to destroy more mines than you have mine deflectors.
sentences.chinese: 所以你可以摧毀數量多於你水雷偏導器的水雷。

sentences.english: Note: A ML requires a size9 port in order to reload mines.
sentences.chinese: 佈雷艦需要大小爲9的港口裝載水雷。
